The purpose of this app is to determine the influence of User Interface design. It will collect data on the choices users make to determine which elements on a page are the most/least attractive to them, among other attributes. We will be using the Gestalt Principles as a guideline to selectively test different layout properties. \n\nThese include:
This principle is about how people naturally form relationships between objects that look similar to eachother.
This principle is about how our eyes follow the smoothest path along a screen.
Closure is about how a group of objects can use negative space to form an image where our minds fill in the empty space
This principle concerns how objects can be organised with deliberate spacing to visually group them together or apart.
Please touch any of the icons to learn more about the principles
When you\'re ready, touch the button below to begin the test
How many groups of elements do you perceive there to be?
Which element colour stands out the most to you?
How do you differentiate between different groups?
Which line stands out initially to you?
Neither (Saw entire image as a whole)
What shape do you initially see?
Collection of triangles and irregular shapes
